plot: A group of army personnel and nurses attempt a dangerous and arduous trek across the deserts of North Africa during the second world war. The leader of the team dreams of his ice cold beer when he reaches Alexandria, but the problems just won't go away.   Written by  Rob Hartill
title: Ice cold in Alex
plot_es: A group of army personnel and nurses attempt a dangerous and arduous trek across the deserts of North Africa during the second world war. The leader of the team dreams of his ice cold beer when he reaches Alexandria, but the problems just won't go away.   Written by  Rob Hartill

cast.role: Captain van der Poel / Hauptman Otto Lutz
cast.name: Anthony Quayle
